title: Microsoft Toolkit 2.4.8 Final [Activate Win Vista,Win 7,Win 8,Wi
description:
The same creator of the "Toolkit and EZ-Activator" for Office 2010, "Microsoft Toolkit" is a tool kit for the activation of Office 2010, Office 2013, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows Server 2012, Windows 8 and Windows 8.1 Preview . Includes a set of tools for managing licenses, backups, restoration and activation.


*With Microsoft Toolkit you can activate the full suite of Office 2010, Office 2013 or if you want just a single component of Office (as Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc.).
*Enables multiple versions of Office 2010, the type Ã¢â‚¬Å“Volume Licence (VL)Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ and type retail.
*Active Project and Visio 2010 Professional and Standard.
*Activate Ã¢â‚¬Å“Office 2013 Professional PlusÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ type the Volume Licence (VL).
*Active Project and Visio 2013 Professional and Standard.
*It also promises to enable some versions of Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows Server 2012 and Windows 8.


Microsoft Toolkit includes two applications: "Office Toolkit 2.4.8 Final" and "Windows Toolkit 2.4.8 Final":

*Ã¢â‚¬Å“Office Toolkit 2.4.8 FinalÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ is the new stable version of the well-known and successful activating "Office 2010 Toolkit and EZ-Activator" (the latest stable version is 2.3.2). According to words of the developer of this tool, there will be no new versions of "Office 2010 Toolkit" as individual and standalone application, but the new and improved versions of this activator will come built into "Microsoft ToolkitÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ since version 2.4.0.
*Ã¢â‚¬Å“Windows Toolkit 2.4.8 FinalÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ is a tool that also comes integrated with Microsoft Toolkit and promises activating some versions of Windows.

Is shown below the exact list of editions of Office and Windows that can be activated with Microsoft Toolkit 2.4.8 Final:

Activatable Office editions:

...Office 2010: Home and Student, Professional Plus, Standard.
...Project 2010: Professional, Standard.
...Visio 2010: Premium, Professional, Standard.
...Individual Applications: Word, PowerPoint, Access, Excel, InfoPath, Publisher, Outlook, OneNote, SharePoint, etc.
...Office 2013: Professional Plus, Standard.
...Project 2013: Professional, Standard.
...Visio 2013: Professional, Standard.
...Individual Applications: Word, PowerPoint, Lync, Access, Excel, InfoPath, Publisher, Outlook, OneNote, SharePoint, etc.

Activatable Windows editions:
...Windows Vista: Business, Business N, Enterprise, Enterprise N.
...Windows 7: Enterprise, Enterprise E, Enterprise N, Professional, Professional E, Professional N.
...Windows Server 2008: Compute Cluster (HPC), Datacenter, Datacenter (No Hyper-V), Enterprise, Enterprise (No Hyper-V), Itanium, Standard, Standard (No Hyper-V), Web.
...Windows Server 2008 R2: Compute Cluster (HPC), Datacenter, Enterprise, Itanium, Standard, Multipoint, Web.
...Windows 8: Core, Core (ARM), Core (Country Specific), Core (Single Language), Core N, Enterprise, Enterprise N, Professional, Professional N, Professional WMC (Media Center).
...Windows 8.1 Preview: Core, Core (ARM), Core (Country Specific), Core (Single Language), Core N, Enterprise, Enterprise N, Professional, Professional N, Professional WMC (Media Center).
...Windows Server 2012: Datacenter, Standard, Multipoint Premium, Multipoint Standard.

System Requirements:

Windows Vista Ã‚Â® or later (32-bit & 64-bit).
Microsoft. NET Framework 4.0 or 4.5 (already included in Windows 8, but not included in previous versions of Windows).
Microsoft Office 2010, Office 2013.(x32 or x64)

Instalation notes:
Las instrucciones en espaÃƒÂ±ol estan dentro de la carpeta!!

Instructions:

NOTE: Before running the program to prevent problems in your work you must temporarily disable the Ã¢â‚¬Å“AntivirusÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, the "Windows FirewallÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, the "Windows Defender" and "Windows SmartScreenÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½. This is because the Windows security systems block these types of tools, and the antivirus does the same.

1.- Run as Administrator, then open a window and at the bottom right there will be two buttons with one image every one, one is the symbol of office and the other is the symbol of Windows, choose which you want to activate.

2.- Once inside go to the tab "Activation" and click the "Activate" button. Waiting to be installed and closes the program.

3.- Enables again the security systems and antivirus!

4.- Restart the PC.

This will activate you Windows or Office but a few months later you can get out a notice that is pirated, then follow the same steps, so I recommend that you keep this tool!

-----------------------------------------------------

Permanent Activation by "AutoKMS Tool":

If you want to avoid from time to time be activating your Microsoft products, then I recommend you use the "AutoKMS Tool", this tool is installed on your pc and every time you need an activation your Office or your Windows will do this automatically.

Instructions:

1.- Read the note at the beginning of the previous instruction, and follow it.

2.- Run as Administrator, then open a window and at the bottom right there will be two buttons with one image every one, one is the symbol of office and the other is the symbol of Windows, choose which you want to activate.

3.- Once inside go to the tab "Activation" and in the "Activator / Tool Selection" make this choice the "AutoKMS" and then you click on the button "Install".

4.- When the installation is finished close the program.

5.- Go to your settings on your antivirus and put the "AutoKMS Tool" (C:  Windows  AutoKMS  AutoKMS.exe) in the list of excluded. We must do this because it will activate the antivirus detect an intrusion and delete it. Do not worry, it's just a false positive.

6.- Enables again the security systems and antivirus!

7.- Restart the PC.
